name: AirDash
description:
AirDash is a single player micro management + time management airline tycoon game. You have started a budget airline business, your goal is to make it profitable.

Making and keeping the business afloat is easy. Fly to different cities, just keep track of the number of passengers flying that is what makes you money.

Add more planes to fly to different continents and upgrade your flights.

Safe flying.
